ModMetaData.name: BattIePatch: Textured Metal Tile
ModMetaData.author: BattIeBear
ModMetaData.description:
V1.6
I really liked the bioferrite plate texture from Anomaly, this mod lets you use it for any other metal floors. Comes with settings to choose whether or not it applies to metal, gold, or silver tiles.
Also comes with a patch to do the opposite, making the bioferrite plate use the vanilla metal tile texture instead.
Found an issue? Leave a comment!
